source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn to Paint Pets with Oil Paint - Pet Portrait Tutorial
items.headline: Learn the tips and tricks of painting pets from a full-time artist
objectives_summary: Learn what brushes, paint, and equipment you will need
Learn about colour theory and colour mixing
Learn how to paint a pet's nose, eyes, and fur

items.title: Learn to Create your Own Mosaic Artworks
items.headline: Masterclass for creating own design for any kind of mosaic artworks
objectives_summary: Design Various Kinds of Mosaics
Implement Varieties of Mosaic Arts
Explore Various Artforms

items.title: Needle felting for beginners, felted mouse,  wool sculpture
items.headline: Felted toy "A mouse in the big city"
objectives_summary: Choosing wool and tools for felting
How to get the exact size that you need
Creating a simple form

items.title: Acrylic painting for beginners
items.headline: Learn to draw and paint from scratch!
objectives_summary: Learn how to create a 3D image from a 2D surface
Learn how to mix paint to achieve the correct hues
Learn terminology associated with drawing and painting

items.title: Beginner's Watercolor class - Painting roses.
items.headline: Learn to paint a beautiful floral painting with an abstract touch.
objectives_summary: Various types of texturing and the beauty in including abstract form of texturing.
Importance of layering and how it can be a game changer in your art gradually.
Ways to choose good supplies and to know alternatives to the suppies

items.title: Acrylic lesson - Swan Lake - Landscape

visible_instructors.title: Ekaterina Fedorova
visible_instructors.name: Ekaterina
visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor and Acrylic Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: We learn how to paint the Swan Lake Landscape step-by-step!
objectives_summary: Discover how you can paint landscape: how to plan layers for it, what parts to paint and in what order, how to go from the general to the specific
Learn acrylic painting techniques: layering, blending, detailing, glazing
Learn acrylic painting basics: values, color mixing, issue fixing

items.title: Character Design with Tigerchu
items.headline: No subtitles
objectives_summary: Character Design

items.title: Create Your Empowering Feng Shui Vision Board

visible_instructors.title: Patricia "Trish" John
visible_instructors.name: Patricia "Trish"
visible_instructors.job_title: Your Spiritual Connection || Feng Shui Practitioner

items.headline: Online Vision Board Creation Course With Professional Feng Shui Consultant
objectives_summary: Basics of Feng Shui: Understanding it's meaning, guas of the bagua map, and how to implement easy changes.
How to perform a salt burn to clear non-beneficial and stagnant energy to prepare for new opportunities to enter your life.
How to set attainable and actionable goals for all areas of your life.

items.title: How To Draw Shojo Manga Volume 2
items.headline: Your Step-By-Step Guide To Drawing Shojo Manga - Volume 2
objectives_summary: How To Draw Shojo Manga Volume 2

items.title: International Color Series

visible_instructors.name: Ben
visible_instructors.job_title: Artist and Artful Kids Club Co-founder
visible_instructors.title: Ben Faubion

items.headline: This series features four lessons based on famous artists, each highlighting a masterful use of color.
objectives_summary: Learn how to work with pastels and color pencil
Art history from famous artists
Art techniques and tips

items.title: Stained Glass on Stone
items.headline: Creating Weatherproof, Indoor and Outdoor Stained Glass Art
objectives_summary: How to make Stained Glass Art ON STONE (Weatherproof - Indoor/Outdoor)

items.title: Drawing Portraits - The Eye
items.headline: Learn step-by-step on how we can draw realistic eyes using pencil.
objectives_summary: How To Draw A Realistic Eye
You will roughly need two hours for this course and your pencils - 2H,2B & 8B.
Make sure your pencils are sharp but be careful not to hurt yourself!

items.title: 67 types of online theater performances
items.headline: Practical course
objectives_summary: to create online theater performance

items.title: Learn Loose Watercolors - Painting Watercolor Birds
items.headline: Learn how to paint 4 different birds in watercolor, and learn how to use negative painting to create striking effects.
objectives_summary: Learn negative painting techniques in watercolor
Learn basic watercolorr techniques
Learn how to paint loosely and vibrantly

items.title: Drawing Animals 101
items.headline: How to Draw Animals Step by Step for Beginners
objectives_summary: Drawing Animals

items.title: Daily Drawing Challenge: 14 things to draw
items.headline: Form a habit of drawing daily with this 14 days of daily drawing challenge!
objectives_summary: Learn to draw various things every day!
Draw with me and have a set of drawings at the end of this challenge!
Learn to arrange drawings and create a scene with them!
